Mario is the main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. He is brave, optimistic, and always ready to help. Recognized by his blue overalls, red cap, and characteristic mustache, he is known for saving Princess Peach and defeating Bowser multiple times.

Luigi is Mario´s brother and a hero in the Mushroom Kingdom. He is distinguished by his green overalls and matching cap. Although more fearful than his brother, he is always ready to face any challenge.

Princess Peach is the kind and charismatic leader of the Mushroom Kingdom. She always cares for her subjects and seeks to create a harmonious world. Known for her pink dress and kind nature, she also knows how to defend herself when necessary.
Toad is a loyal resident of the Mushroom Kingdom and serves Princess Peach. Recognized by his distinctive red-spotted head, he is fast and brave, always ready to help his friends.

Bowser, the fearsome king of the Koopas, is Mario´s arch-nemesis and the greatest threat to the Mushroom Kingdom. With his large size, spiked shell, and imposing attitude, he is always plotting evil schemes.
Yoshi is a dinosaur from Yoshi´s Island who has become Mario´s most reliable companion. He is known for his loyalty and his incredible ability to eat enemies and objects with his long tongue.

Princess Daisy is the cheerful and brave leader of Sarasaland. With her yellow dress and extroverted nature, she joins Mario and his friends in various sports and adventures. She is known for her great courage and energy.
Wario is the self-proclaimed arch-nemesis of Mario. He wears purple overalls and a yellow cap, along with his characteristic zigzag mustache. He is selfish and seeks wealth at any cost.
Waluigi is Wario´s ally and rival. He has a disdainful attitude towards Mario and Luigi and is always looking for ways to ruin their plans. With his long legs and arms, he is agile and cunning.
Boo is a mischievous ghost who haunts dark, abandoned places. Although he tends to hide, he is always ready to make life more difficult for the heroes of the Mushroom Kingdom.
Donkey Kong is the king of the jungle, known for his incredible strength and love of bananas. With his red tie with his initials and imposing appearance, he is a fierce defender of his territory.
